mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS userId, u.nickname, m.mbti, m.description, u.rating, u.createdAt AS joinedAt FROM user u LEFT JOIN mbti m ON u.mbtiId = m.id WHERE u.id = #{userId}

SELECT u.id AS userId, u.nickname, m.mbti, m.description, u.rating, u.createdAt AS joinedAt FROM friends f JOIN user u ON f.friendId = u.id LEFT JOIN mbti m ON u.mbtiId = m.id WHERE f.userId = #{userId} AND f.status = 1 ORDER BY f.createdAt ASC
